Author: lilmisssuccubus
Text: It's going to be okay. How much time do you have left before your exam? It's not too late to get some studying in.   &#x200B;  In college, I had a LONG period of just self destruction. Wouldn't login to my student portal because it was so bad. It gets better. Your semester is almost over, come back stronger in the fall. If you have to retake some classes, you retake them. Keep fighting, you got this.
